flawed_nl_solution:
Tom earns 3 lawns * $12 per lawn = $<<3*12=36>>36 per month.
Tom earned $36 + $10 = $<<36+10=64>>64 last month.
Tom's profit last month was $64 - $17 gas money = $<<64-17=47>>47.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 46, not 64. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
